fields.title: How to write a project proposal?
fields.content:
Dear Students,
Please refer the information in the links below to write a project proposal.
https://www.fool.com/the-blueprint/project-proposal
https://www.mavenlink.com/resources/project-proposal
The project proposal will be completed in four weeks.
Thanks and good luck.
Loan Nguyen

fields.title: Assignment policies and topic information
fields.content:
Dear Students,
The students in a class can be divided into groups of 6. Then choose a topic from the assignment_2021 folder in Content. Each topic belongs to only one group.
The student representative in the group fills in the following link:
https://bit.ly/3zVtlBA
and creates a group on the IU platform.
Good luck!
Regards,
Loan Nguyen

fields.title: Code and Link to Login the Discrete Maths Class
fields.content:
Dear all,
I send you the Code and Link (Ms.Team) for our Online Class next week.
Code: owhjd0v
Link: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3aqCQZq7CQBiDKR0F51wxWXn6NTnhc4i7WzwqSo3qHFWg1%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=b198acd0-56a5-4527-ae63-a01d726a9102&tenantId=a7380202-eb54-415a-9b66-4d9806cfab42

Sinh NV

fields.title: Deadline of HW3
fields.content:
Dear all,
I am sorry, there is a problem with the deadline of submission HW3
It is now extended to end of today.
Best,
Sinh NV

fields.title: Attendance check
fields.content:
Every student sends me an email.
Loan Nguyen

fields.title: Remind for midterm examination
fields.content:
Dear All,

I remind you the midterm examination will be implemented this Saturday (13/11/2021) , starting at 1:00 PM.
You need to check Email that sent by the IT Center of IU to know which group (1 or 2) you are belong to. Please login on time and to the right room.
Many of you required me to send an example of midterm exam from previous semester to refer. I think, it is not necessary. You should review all exercises and homeworks that you have done before.  
However, I attach an example in the Content "Example of ME"  (just an example for you to refer)

Good luck to all,
See you, 
Sinh NV.
